PRESENTS...

10 day Blogging Course

Learn the essentials of blogging with Kiersten Rich & Institute of Code

Essentials ofblogging

No blogging experience? No worries!

No coding experience? No worries! Our 10 day bootcamp will take you from little or no experience to creating your very own beautiful, responsive websites in no time! You will learn how to use HTML, CSS and Javascript to design, create and build websites for scratch. There is no prior experience or skills required before joining this bootcamp! Whether you are a freelance creative, entrepreneur, business owner or marketer we make sure our mentors know exactly what you want to get out of the program so they can help you achieve your goals!

By the end of the program you will have built a portfolio of 1 - 2 live responsive websites!

Your Expert Mentors

Kiersten Rich

THE BLONDE ABROAD

WHAT YOU WILLLEARN

  • + web fundamentals
  • + talk-the-talk with developers
  • + HTML, CSS & basic Javascript
  • + how to build a responsive website
  • + how to create a blog
  • + setup an ecommerce store
  • + create galleries, contact forms & sliders
  • + embed videos & interactive maps
  • + cross-browser compatability
  • + how to set up hosting & domain names
  • + optimising your site for google
}

all the essentials of blogging

Learn from Experience

You'll come away from one of our web development bootcamps with the skills and confidence to build and manage 1-2 fully responsive websites from scratch. Not bad for 10 days!

You'll be learning the latest tools and technologies, going beyond textbook basics and gaining real insights from experienced mentors who are actively working in the industry. Learn best practices, common trends, and which skills to continue to develop and improve if you want to land the job of your dreams. 

Download a Course Guide

The Villa

After waking up in a tropical paradise, and maybe sneaking in a yoga session or a massage, we will dive in deep and start writing code, learning from doing... with the help of your experienced mentors, see your screen come to life from the very first day. With spectacular scenery as your backdrop, and the chef whipping up ice-cold watermelon granita to keep you refreshed, you can focus on learning, building and creating. When you need a break, take a quick dip in the pool, or sip an ice latte in the sun.

The Rooms

After enjoying a chef-prepared lunch in the shade, get back to it for another 1-2 hours of practical work. Then you are free to spend some one-on-one time with your experienced mentors working on your portfolio, or explore all that the town has to offer. Join us to wander through exotic markets, explore ancient rainforests, hit the surf or just relax with a cocktail by the pool. At night we'll gather back together in the villa for an indulgent 3+ course meal and some great company.

The Institute of Code

Institute of Code runs 10 day immersive coding bootcamps in beautiful locations around the world. We create an environment of accelerated learning, so you can learn in demand digital skills while having an experience of a lifetime.
